feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-12-17T02:20:30.555769Z; ; ; <作者>; <名称>;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;英特尔、三星和台积电演示 3D 堆叠晶体管</stitle>; <id>;https://spectrum.ieee.org/cfe-intel-samsung-tsmc</id>; <更新>;2023-12-16T23:19:40.334096Z</更新>; <link href="https://spectrum.ieee.org/cfet-intel-samsung-tsmc"/>; <作者>; <名称>;jnord< /name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jnord</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://spectrum.ieee. org/media-library/a-mottled-grey-slab-with-patterns-of-darker-and-lighter-grey-at-the-faces.jpg?id=50810401&width=1200&height=663" style="width: 220px ；高度：122px；" />;<br />;芯片制造商英特尔、三星和台积电已经展示了 CFETS（互补场效应晶体管），它是堆叠 CMOS 逻辑所需的两种类型晶体管的单一结构。这些 CFET 有可能使未来处理器中的晶体管密度增加一倍。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#intel-samsung-and-tsmc-demo-3d-stacked-transistors" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38668713" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;芯片上的变压器</stitle>; <id>;https://www.etched.ai</id>; <更新>;2023-12-17T00:19 :40.336010Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.etched.ai"/>; <作者>; <name>;vasinov</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user? id=vasinov</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://assets-global.website-files.com/6570a6bdf377183fb173431e/6570b5e6b0cd5f0189cf79b8_hero.webp" style="width: 220px ；高度：124px；" />;<br />;蚀刻在硅上的变压器。通过将 Transformer 架构烧录到我们的芯片中，我们正在创建世界上最强大的 Transformer 推理服务器。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#transformers-on-chips" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/ item?id=38668823" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; < title type="text">;是否有可能在地质记录中发现工业文明？</stitle>; <id>;https://www.cambridge.org/core/journals/international-journal-of-astrobiology/article /志留纪假设-是否有可能在地质记录中检测到工业文明/77818514AA6907750B8F4339F7C70EC6</id>; <更新>;2023-12-17T00:19:40.336474Z< /更新>; <link href="https://www.cambridge.org/core/journals/international-journal-of-astrobiology/article/silurian-hypothesis-would-it-be-possible-to-detect-an- Industrial-civilization-in-the-geological-record/77818514AA6907750B8F4339F7C70EC6"/>; <author>; <name>;pseudolus</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=pseudolus</uri>; < /author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://static.cambridge.org/covers/IJA_0_0_0/international-journal-of-astrobiology.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 294px;" />;<br />;文章讨论了探测地球上过去工业文明痕迹的可能性，并提出了区分工业原因和自然发生的气候事件的测试。它还探讨了人类文明对地球的影响。地质记录并表明文明的足迹可能在相对较短的时间内具有自我限制。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#would-it-be-possible-to-detect-an -industrial-civilization-in-geological-record" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38668884" target="_blank" >;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;NASA 研究发现生命-土卫二上的火花能源和分子</stitle>; <id>;https://phys.org/news/2023-12-nasa-life-sparking-energy-source-molecule.html</id>; <updated>;2023 -12-16T18:19:40.336958Z</更新>; <link href="https://phys.org/news/2023-12-nasa-life-sparking-energy-source-molecule.html"/>; <作者>; <name>;wglb</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=wglb</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https: //scx1.b-cdn.net/csz/news/800a/2023/nasa-study-finds-life.jpg" style="width: 220px;高度：129px;" />;<br />;一项研究分析了美国宇航局卡西尼号任务在土星卫星土卫二上的数据，发现了生命关键成分和增压能源的证据。研究人员还发现了强大化学能源的证据在月球的海洋中。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#nasa-study-finds-life-sparking-energy-source-and-molecule-at-enceladus" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38661903" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Chimera Linux</stitle>; <id>;https://chimera-linux.org/</id >; <更新>;2023-12-16T21:19:40.337339Z</更新>; <link href="https://chimera-linux.org/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;MaximilianEmel</名称>; <uri>; https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=MaximilianEmel</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Chimera 是一个通用操作系统，旨在捕捉复杂分布的便利性，同时保留概念性简单。它是使用新颖的工具和方法从头开始构建的，它消除了遗留的缺陷，从而提供了一个现代的、功能齐全的操作系统。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#chimera-linux" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item? id=38667503" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题类型="text">;深圳电子新基本指南</stitle>; <id>;https://www.bunniestudios.com/blog/?p=6886</id>; <updated>;2023-12-16T18:19 ：40.337703Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.bunniestudios.com/blog/?p=6886"/>; <作者>; <name>;kungfudoi</name>; <uri>;https://news .ycombinator.com/user?id=kungfudoi</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://bunniefoo.com/bunnie/new-shenzhen-guide-original-shenzhen -guide-01_sm.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：124px；" />;<br />;《深圳电子产品基本指南》已更新，现更名为《新版深圳电子产品基本指南》。新版本包括有关中国的数字礼仪信息、更新的地图等。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-new-essential-guide-to- electronics-in-shenzhen" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38666032" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Atree：一种简单高效的无指针树实现</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/tlack/atree</id>; <更新>;2023-12-16T18:19:40.338126Z</更新>; <link href="https://github.com/tlack/atree"/>; <作者>; <名称>;spenczar5</名称>; <uri>; https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=spenczar5</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://opengraph.githubassets.com/ed6a6a7758a7c5118af825194c8335d6b19b4ea131d041dc36bc923325805241/tlack/ atree" style="宽度：220px；高度：110px；" />;<br />;此存储库包含用 C++17 实现的树状数据类型，采用 Treetable 中 Stevan Apter 的风格：q 中的案例研究。树是一种数据结构，其中值彼此具有父子关系。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#atree-a-simple-and-efficient-pointer-free-tree-implementation" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38666287" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;美联储如何反弹币安</stitle>; <id>;https://www.programmablemutter.com/p/how-the-feds-bounced -binance</id>; <更新>;2023-12-16T22:19:40.338514Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.programmablemutter.com/p/how-the-feds-bounced-binance" />; <author>; <name>;haskellandchill</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=haskellandchill</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src ="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1456,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post-media.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages% 2F66e29811-00aa-40ef-b740-09a7b50077d6_1792x1024.webp"样式="宽度：220像素；高度：126像素；" />;<br />;币安最近的认罪并不重要，重要的是它必须遵守的监控协议。美国政府现在有一个核心角色，币安，它可以控制该角色来监控资金流动并在加密货币社区中执行监管。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#how-the-feds-bounced-binance" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=38667962" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;这个国家需要的是 18 美分的硬币 (2002) [pdf]</stitle>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=cokernel_hacker</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; <a href="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/#what-this-country-needs-is-an-18c-piece-2002-pdf" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// /news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38665334" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io /feed.xml">; <title type="text">;通过 GRUB2 引导加载程序对多个 ISO 文件进行 USB 引导</stitle>; <id>;https://www.linuxbabe.com/desktop-linux/boot-from-iso -files-using-grub2-boot-loader</id>; <更新>;2023-12-16T20:19:40.339599Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.linuxbabe.com/desktop-linux/ boot-from-iso-files-using-grub2-boot-loader"/>; <author>; <name>;transpute</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=transpute</uri >; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.linuxbabe.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/03/Boot-ISO-Files-From-GRUB2-Boot- Loader.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 126px;" />;<br />;本教程展示如何使用 GRUB2 引导加载程序引导存储在硬盘上的 ISO 文件。它解释了为不同的 Linux 发行版和 Windows 10 向 GRUB 引导菜单添加自定义条目的过程.<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#usb-boot-of-multiple-iso-files-by-grub2-boot-loader" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38663958" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https ://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;S3 Express One Zone，并不完全是我所希望的</stitle>; <id>;https://jack-vanlightly.com/博客/2023/11/29/s3-express-one-zone-not-quite-what-i-hoped-for</id>; <更新>;2023-12-16T22:19:40.340305Z</更新>; <link href="https://jack-vanlightly.com/blog/2023/11/29/s3-express-one-zone-not-quite-what-i-hoped-for"/>; <作者>; <名称>;e2e4 </name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=e2e4</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://images.squarespace -cdn.com/content/v1/56894e581c1210fead06f878/138cf7fa-f051-43ba-92f9-cbfaee780e14/Choices1.png" style="width: 220px; height: 95px;" />;<br />;AWS 宣布了一种新的低延迟 S3 存储类别，但它并不是使用复制缓存的低延迟工作负载的解决方案。S3 Express One Zone 的成本与现有交叉存储类似-AZ 收费，比 S3 标准贵 8 倍。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#s3-express-one-zone-not-quite-what-i-hoped-for" 目标="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38667876" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;公钥指纹有何意义？</stitle>; <id >;https://www.johndcook.com/blog/2023/12/15/pgp-fingerprint/</id>; <更新>;2023-12-16T18:19:40.340667Z</更新>; <link href="https ://www.johndcook.com/blog/2023/12/15/pgp-fingerprint/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;rolph</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user? id=rolph</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.johndcook.com/jdc_20170630.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;公钥加密使用两个密钥：私钥和公钥。当您生成公钥时，您会得到一对数字，一个您保密，一个您公开. <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#what-is-the-point-of-a-public-key-fingerprint" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38666458" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// /hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;免疫细胞在出生前塑造肺组织，提供治疗疾病的新方法</stitle>; <id>;https://medicalxpress.com/news/ 2023-12-immune-cells-lung-tissue-birth.html</id>; <更新>;2023-12-16T21:19:40.341013Z</更新>; <link href="https://medicalxpress.com/news /2023-12-immune-cells-lung-tissue-birth.html"/>; <作者>; <名称>;wglb</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=wglb</ uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://scx1.b-cdn.net/csz/news/800a/2023/immune-cells-shape-lun.jpg" 样式=“宽度：220px； height: 146px;" />;<br />;免疫细胞在发育过程中指导人类肺组织的生长发挥着至关重要的作用，彻底改变了我们对早期肺部发育和免疫细胞作用的理解。这一发现引发了关于其潜在作用的疑问全身其他发育器官中的免疫细胞。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#immune-cells-shape-lung-tissue-before-birth-giving-new-ways-of-treating -diseases" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38661795" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>; </content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;技术报告撰写指南 [pdf]</stitle >; <id>;https://ias.ieee.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/2020-01-16_IET_Technical_Report_Writing_Guidelines.pdf</id>; <更新>;2023-12-16T21:19:40.341360Z</已更新>; <link href="https://ias.ieee.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/2020-01-16_IET_Technical_Report_Writing_Guidelines.pdf"/>; <作者>; <名称>;smartmic</名称>; <uri >;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=smartmic</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-技术报告写作指南-pdf" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38667739" target="_blank ">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Rotor 技术发布R550X自主直升机的生产</stitle>; <id>;https://www.futureflight.aero/news-article/2023-12-07/rotor-technologies-launches-production-r550x-autonomous-helicopter</id>; <更新>;2023-12-16T21:19:40.341710Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.futureflight.aero/news-article/2023-12-07/rotor-technologies-launches-product-r550x -autonomous-helicopter"/>; <作者>; <名称>;rbanffy</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=rbanffy</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html ">;<img src="https://www.futureflight.aero/images/ff-logo-full-tagline-medium.png" style="宽度：220px;高度：104px;" />;<br />;Rotor Technologies 推出了 R550X 自主直升机，这是世界上最大的无人驾驶民用直升机。它专为需要更大有效载荷能力和安全性的货运、公用事业和海上作业而设计。无人机或电动垂直起降飞行器所能提供的航程范围。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#rotor-technologies-launches-product-of-r550x-autonomous-helicopter" target="_blank">;[summary]< /a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38667435" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;ASML 与三星达成 2nm 芯片协议</stitle>; <id>;https://www.koreaherald.com/ view.php?ud=20231215000518</id>; <更新>;2023-12-16T22:19:40.342423Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.koreaherald.com/view.php?ud=20231215000518 "/>; <作者>; <名称>;ycdxvjp </名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ycdxvjp</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<img src =“https://res.heraldm.com/content/image/2023/12/15/20231215000510_0.jpg”样式=“宽度：220px; height: 170px;" />;<br />;三星电子董事长李在镕对荷兰之行表示满意，荷兰的大部分成果都集中在半导体上。三星与唯一的 EUV 设备制造商 ASML 签署了协议，在韩国建立一个开发先进 EUV 技术的研究机构。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#asml-and-samsung-seal-deal-on-2nm-chips" target="_blank ">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38668080" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry >; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;2024 年美国首次将太阳能和风能取代煤炭发电</stitle>; < id>;https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2023-12-12/solar-and-wind-to-top-coal-power-in-us-for-first-time-in-2024< /id>; <更新>;2023-12-16T20:19:40.342782Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2023-12-12/solar-and-wind -to-top-coal-power-in-us-for-first-time-in-2024"/>; <author>; <name>;goplayoutside</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user ?id=goplayoutside</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://assets.bwbx.io/images/users/iqjWHBFdfxIU/ifsOTdWSKcLM/v1/-1x-1。 jpg" 样式="宽度:220px; height: 147px;" />;<br />;在面板安装量激增的推动下，明年美国太阳能和风能系统发电量将首次超过燃煤发电量。到 2024 年，煤炭发电量将达到约 5990 亿千瓦时，根据周二发布的政府数据。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#solar-and-wind-to-top-coal-power-in-us-for-first-time-in- 2024" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38667006" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;< /content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;孩之宝解雇威世智员工令人费解</stitle >; <id>;https://www.geekwire.com/2023/hasbro-laying-off-wizards-of-the-coast-staff-is-baffling-and-could-lead-to-a-brain-drain/ </id>; <更新>;2023-12-17T00:19:40.343136Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.geekwire.com/2023/hasbro-laying-off-wizards-of-the- Coast-staff-is-baffling-and-could-lead-to-a-brain-drain/"/>; <author>; <name>;webmaven</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user ?id=webmaven</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cdn.geekwire.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/wizards2-630x473.jpg “样式=”宽度：220px;身高： 166px;" />;<br />;尽管子公司威世智 (Wizards of the Coast) 业绩强劲，但孩之宝已解雇该子公司的员工。这一决定可能会对两家公司的未来产生负面影响。<a href="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/#hasbro-laying-off-wizards-of-the-coast-staff-is-baffling" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// /news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38668906" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io /feed.xml">; <title type="text">;策划时我们失去的东西跟随金钱</stitle>; <id>;https://hyperallergic.com/861508/what-we-lose-when-curating-follows -the-money-capturing-moment-tate-modern/</id>; <更新>;2023-12-16T20:19:40.343486Z</更新>; <link href="https://hyperallergic.com/861508/what -we-lose-when-curating-follows-the-money-capturing-moment-tate-modern/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;bryanrasmussen</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/ user?id=bryanrasmussen</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://i0.wp.com/hyperallergic-newspack.s3.amazonaws.com/uploads/2023/ 12/Capturing3-1200x1320.jpg?resize=780%2C858&quality=100&ssl=1" style="width: 220px;高度：242px;" />;<br />;泰特现代美术馆题为《捕捉瞬间》的展览探讨了绘画与摄影之间的关系，但未能对这种对话提供明确的说明。整个展览明显缺乏策展重点和严谨性，只有一个房间实现了展览的构想。该展览是泰特现代美术馆和国巨基金会的合作，展出了两个藏品的作品。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#what-we -lose-when-curating-follows-the-money" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38652626" target=" _blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;行动- R理论体现在ACT-R软件</stitle>; <id>;http://act-r.psy.cmu.edu/software/</id>; <updated>;2023-12-16T20:19:40.343827 Z</updated>; <link href="http://act-r.psy.cmu.edu/software/"/>; <作者>; <name>;Tomte</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator .com/user?id=Tomte</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;ACT-R理论体现在ACT-R软件中。该软件可作为应用程序或源代码提供。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#act-r-the-theory-is-embodied-in-act-r-the-software" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38663960" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;SSH3：使用 HTTP/3 和 QUIC 的 SSHv2</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/francoismichel/ssh3 </id>; <更新>;2023-12-16T15:19:40.344171Z</更新>; <link href="https://github.com/francoismichel/ssh3"/>; <作者>; <名称>;kieto</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=kieto</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ francoismichel/ssh3/main/resources/figures/ssh3.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：83px；" />;<br />;SSH3 是对 SSH 协议的彻底重新审视，将其语义映射到 HTTP 机制之上。 SSH3使用QUIC+TLS1.3来建立安全通道，并使用HTTP授权机制来进行用户身份验证。它允许进行改进，例如新的 HTTP 身份验证方法、对端口扫描攻击的鲁棒性以及更快的会话建立。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#ssh3-sshv2-using-http-3-and-quic" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38664729" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;岛屿巨人症</stitle>; <id>;https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Island_gigantism</id>; <更新>;2023-12-16T12： 19:40.344518Z</updated>; <link href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Island_gigantism"/>; <author>; <name>;elsewhen</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator .com/user?id=elsewhen</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/69/Deinogalerix_Gargano_fauna .jpg/220px-Deinogalerix_Gargano_fauna.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：107px；" />;<br />;岛屿巨人症是一种生物现象，岛上孤立的动物物种的体型与其大陆亲属相比急剧增大。这是更普遍的“岛屿效应”或“福斯特规则”的一个方面，该规则认为，当大陆动物在岛屿上定居时，小型物种往往会进化出较大的身体，而大型物种往往会进化出较小的身体<a href="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/#island-gigantism" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38663590" target=" _blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;准备在困难的地方执行任务</stitle>; <id>;https://www.bitecode.dev/p/preparing-for-missions-in-difficult</id>; <更新>;2023-12-16T13:19:40.344867Z< /updated>; <link href="https://www.bitecode.dev/p/preparing-for-missions-in-difficult"/>; <作者>; <name>;_dain_</name>; <uri>;https:// news.ycombinator.com/user?id=_dain_</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_120,c_limit,f_auto, q_auto:好，fl_progressive:陡峭/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post-media.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2Fccb7ac35-1459-49b7-ab2c-41bc8ecf0350_1024x1024.webp" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;一些开发者专门从事难以到达的地方的开发和训练任务，这些任务与传统任务的要求不同。他们需要打包各种东西，对所有东西都有备份，并且设置软件以脱机工作。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#preparing-for-missions-in-difficult-places" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38663713" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// /hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;被称为“歼灭者”的悉尼男子赢得电子表格世界冠军</stitle>; <id>;https://www.theguardian.com/australia-新闻/2023/dec/15/you-didnt-just-succeed-you-exceled-sydney-man-dubbed-the-annihilator-wins-excel-world-championship</id>; <更新>;2023-12-16T18： 19:40.345212Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.theguardian.com/australia-news/2023/dec/15/you-didnt-just-succeed-you-exceled-sydney-man-dubbed -the-annihilator-wins-excel-world-championship"/>; <作者>; <名称>;tonyedgecombe</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=tonyedgecombe</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://i.guim.co.uk/img/media/485fab09df4018595380afe32c57075783ef2d82/982_1099_2082_1249/master/2082.jpg?width=465&dpr=1&s=none"样式=“宽度：220px； height: 132px;" />;<br />;来自悉尼的Andrew“歼灭者”Ngai赢得了Microsoft Excel世界冠军，成为数据处理领域的三届世界冠军。Ngai的胜利最初因得分故障而受到质疑，但他最终成为获胜者。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#sydney-man-dubbed-the-annihilator-wins-spreadsheet-world-championship" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38666340" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;MongoDB 安全声明</stitle>; <id>;https://www.mongodb.com/alerts< /id>; <更新>;2023-12-16T21:19:40.345550Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.mongodb.com/alerts"/>; <作者>; <名称>;ciudilo</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ciudilo</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="http://s3.amazonaws.com/info -mongodb-com/_com_assets/cms/kuzt9r42or1fxvlq2-Meta_Generic.png" style="width: 220px; height: 111px;" />;<br />;MongoDB 正在积极调查涉及未经授权访问某些 MongoDB 公司系统的安全事件，其中包括暴露客户帐户元数据和联系信息。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat .io/#mongodb-security-notice" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38667596" target="_blank">; [comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;我用砖砌了我的圣诞彩灯</stitle>; <id>;https://www.whizzy.org/2023-12-14-bricked-xmas/</id>; <更新>;2023-12-16T02:19:40.345890Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.whizzy.org/2023-12-14-bricked-xmas/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;willcooke</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/ user?id=willcooke</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.whizzy.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/12/ha.jpg"样式=“宽度：220px； height: 100px;" />;<br />;我成功地将廉价的蓝牙 LE 控制的 LED 灯带连接到 Home Assistant。但是，由于加密协议，连接另一组可寻址灯被证明更具挑战性。经过逆向工程后，应用程序并解密数据包，我能够通过自己的代码控制灯光。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#i-bricked-my-christmas-lights" target="_blank">; [摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38657126" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; < /饲料>;
